description: Miracle II products are excellent for personal health care uses in addition to using it as a multi-use household cleaner. These products contain a combination of naturally-based substances. Research has proven that our skin - the largest organ on our body - absorbs 60% of the products it comes into contact with. It's so very important to focus on the ‘what you use in your home’ when it comes to cleaning your living space. It's wise to choose chemical-free products. Miracle II products are naturally pH-balanced and contain NO animal fat, detergents or additives that can clog pores.
